column5: Hi guys  I am looking for the best place to get new piston rings and gaskets for my 89 Merc 80hp. I have a line on a place in the states but would prefer local. Any suggestions?  Need to order ASAP.  Thanks  Speed
The only 2 places I can think of are Harris Boat Works in Gores Landing ( Rice Lake) or Willow Bend Marina (Otonobee River, Peterborough).
Hey Rob buddy hows things? Hope alls well and looking bright.  Give this guy a call If he dont have Im sure he knows where.  1 905-775-0862.  Paul  Later bud  Give the little guy a hug.
Why not try your local Mercury dealer?
Thanks guys.  Hey Brian, I am good. The kids are doing well. One of these years we are going to have to get out fishing again.  Hope all is well with you.  TTYS. Rob
